metadata.title: Beanies Hat Fleece Knit Wool Skull Cap Neck Warmer for Men and Women in Winter
features: 【 Winter Warm Beanie Hat Scarf Suit 】The suit is your perfect choice for outdoor activities in cold weather! With a fluffy lining, the suit keeps your ears, head and neck warm. Beautiful thick scarf neckline design, can completely protect you from cold attack.

【 High Quality Thermal Material 】The suit is made of high-quality wool and elastic polyester fabric through soft spinning and knitting, which is very comfortable, soft and warm. They have good heat collection performance and can keep the heat for a long time.
【 Detailed Parameters 】Gender, male and female; Season, autumn and winter; Size&Color, one size fits 55-60cm / 21.5-23.6in; Packing list, 1 cap and 1 scarf.
【 Usage scenarios 】Hiking, traveling, camping, skiing, cycling, running, skating and other outdoor sports.

【 Satisfaction Guarantee 】100% money back guarantee. Please return the item for a full refund if you are not satisfied with your purchase. If There Is Any Issues About this product, Please inform us at any time for after sales service and we will follow up closely.
